shloka:
कर्मणो ह्यपि बोद्धव्यं बोद्धव्यं च विकर्मणः।
अकर्मणश्च बोद्धव्यं गहना कर्मणो गतिः।।4.17।।
translation: 4.17 For verily (the true nature) of action (enjoined by the scriptures) should be known, also (that)  of forbidden (or unlawful) action, and of inaction; hard to understand is the nature (path) of action.
